title: frequently during the growing season or is protected from flooding (U.S. Department of Agriculture -Natural Resources Conservation Service, n.d.(b)). Prime farmland is most prominent in the Coastal Plain, Great Plains, and Interior Lowlands physiographic provinces. Data collection on the reduction of prime farmland since 1982 indicates that acreage in all regions of the United States has decreased since 1982.
